mapper.update: update db_projectsku set PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUTYPE = #{skutype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMGURL = #{imgurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PROJECTID, SKU, SKUTYPE, SID, CHECKTIME, CHECKFLAG, CREATETIME, IMGURL from db_projectsku where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, PROJECTID, SKU, SKUTYPE, SID, CHECKTIME, CHECKFLAG, CREATETIME, IMGURL from db_projectsku
